We Fight For Texans

Car Accident Lawyer in Dallas, TX

Jim Adler and Associates has been fighting for Texans for over 30 years. We serve the greater Dallas-Fort Worth metro area, with our personal injury law office centrally located at the Tower at City Place, 2711 North Haskell Ave., Suite 2500.

The Tower at City Place can be found in the heart of Downtown Dallas. As a Dallas Native, Jim Adler knows the importance of helping local people after an accident, injury, or wrongful death of a loved one. Our team of personal injury and car accident attorneys are here to help whether you have been injured at work, in a car or 18-wheeler accident, in a motorcycle accident, have been prescribed a defective drug, or need help claiming Social Security Benefits. Jim Adler wants to fight for you, even against big corporations.

Get Your Free Case Review Today!

We want to hear from you! If you or a loved one has a personal injury case, contact us for a free consultation. You can fill out the form on this page or call us at (877) 517-2990, and one of our personal injury attorneys will reach out to you for a free case review. We work on a contingency fee basis. So If we take on your case, you won’t have to pay us anything unless we win! CC 2.0 Image “Downtown Dallas from the Trinity River” courtesy of nthomas76207

Get a free consultation

Hurt in a car accident? Call our Dallas car accident lawyers now.

Often ranked within the top 15 for most overall vehicle crash deaths in cities within the U.S., the Dallas-Fort Worth, 13-county metro area is second in America for freeway miles per capita. These freeways include:

  • Interstate 45, heading south to Houston
  • Interstate 20, heading west to West Texas and east to East Texas
  • Interstate 30, connecting Dallas and Fort Worth and heading east to Texarkana
  • Interstate 635, partially looping Dallas from northwest to southeast
  • Dallas North Tollway, running 30 miles from downtown Dallas north to Frisco

In 2013, Dallas had 26,846 crashes. Of these, 6,331 involved injuries, and of those, 3,917 involved serious injuries. Those car wrecks also resulted in 146 fatalities in 131 separate collisions. After reporting an accident within the city of Dallas, injury lawyer Jim Adler might be the next person you want to call.

Families whose loved ones were seriously injured or killed in a Dallas auto accident need legal help. They need to claim compensation for their financial losses, including medical expenses, lost present and future salary, and pain and suffering. They need a Dallas car wreck lawyer to handle their personal injury lawsuit. We are those Dallas car accident attorneys.

Accident victims and their families can get professional legal assistance from the Jim Adler & Associates law office in Dallas. Legal options can be discussed with you, and we will work hard to find out the best way to resolve your case, whether that’s a settlement or a personal injury lawsuit.

Our longtime Texas personal injury law firm has championed thousands of Texas victims’ rights for more than 30 years, and a Dallas accident lawyer with Jim Adler & Associates can help you, too. Likewise, a auto accident attorney from our firm can fight for your best interests if you’re in that area.
